page.title: 11Clubs and societies.
page.content: A number of clubs use Talkin Tarn for water sports. A rowing club, two sailing clubs and several{sub-aqua {diving}clubs are active there. A wind surfing school caters for both beginners and more advanced enthusiasts. Canoe groups, scouts and sea cadets all use the facilities. To the west of the Gelt, near Low Gelt Bridge, the{East Cumbria Motor Cycle {Club}meet for scrambling. The adult section numbering about 100 members, meets five times a year. The schoolboys, with about the same membership, meet six times a year. Members are from Cumbria and South West Scotland. There is a club championship with money and trophy prizes to be won. On a good day as many as 1000 spectators are present. Occasionally a car club uses the site for trials.
